summary: Do you dream to be a Lord, A trader or a shareholder ? Do you dream To buy business, titles or properties ? Earning a salary and become rich ? Then this mod is for you !
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://img4.hostingpics.net/pics/569146TechnicalDescription.jpg[/img]
[color=#c9daf8]Version : [/color]1.0.

[color=#c9daf8]language :[/color] English

[color=#c9daf8]Creator : [/color]Or@tchi

[color=#c9daf8]Obligatory files :[/color] Skyrim.esm
[color=#f9cb9c]SKSE[/color] [color=#f4cccc]and[/color] [color=#f9cb9c]SkyUI [/color][color=#f4cccc]required[/color]

[color=#c9daf8]Set up mod : [/color]
Cut [color=#fce5cd]"data"[/color] and paste in the game directory.

[color=#c9daf8]Remove mod : [/color]
Delete [color=#fce5cd]Buy_Whiterun3.esp[/color],  [color=#fce5cd]Buy_Whiterun3.bsa [/color]
sound and SEQ directory ([color=#fce5cd]In your data directory[/color])

[img]http://img4.hostingpics.net/pics/171161SmallDescription.jpg[/img]
[color=#d0e0e3]Do you dream to be a Lord, A trader or a shareholder ?
Do you dream To buy business, titles or properties ?
Earning a salary and become rich ?
Then this mod is for you ![/color]

[img]http://img4.hostingpics.net/pics/432443FullDescription.jpg[/img]
[color=#d0e0e3]This mod you will find:
-The addition of a bank in the city of Whiterun
-The addition of a notary in the city of Whiterun House
-The addition of a master craftsman near Whiterun
-The addition of a shop "Lana, equipments for houses"
-The addition of a house, Braden "The crazy"
-The addition of a secret passage
-The addition of new NPCS
And more...[/color]

[color=#d0e0e3]In this mod, it is possible to make trade and becoming shareholder
Buy legal titles and make of actions for the city.
Buy a house and equipments.
[/color]
[color=#f6b26b]Buy whiterun3 :[/color]
[color=#fce5cd]- Dialogue with the npcs. (sound blank, subtitles recommended).
- Bank and Notary are placed in the city of Whiterun.
- New buildings near Whiterun.
- More possibility
- More surprises  [/color]


[color=#d0e0e3]Compatibility :
------------------[/color]
All official extensions (Dawnguard, Dragonborn, HearthFires)
And most mods.
author: Oratchi
